thread.title: Sports Briefing | Cycling: Vincenzo Nibali Prevails in Italy
thread.title_full: Sports Briefing | Cycling: Vincenzo Nibali Prevails in Italy

author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: Sports Briefing | Cycling: Vincenzo Nibali Prevails in Italy
text: Vincenzo Nibali Prevails in Italy By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Continue reading the main story Vincenzo Nibali of Italy ended a disappointing season by winning Il Lombardia. Nibali finished the 152-mile race from Bergamo to Como, Italy, 21 seconds ahead of Daniel Moreno of Spain and 32 ahead of Thibaut Pinot of France. A version of this brief appears in print on October 5, 2015, on page D8 of the New York edition with the headline: Nibali Prevails in Italy. Order Reprints | Today's Paper | Subscribe Loading...
